articles.content: image: RNA editing is an essential process for life, but there are few databases on how it affects the formation and development of blood cells and how it related to blood diseases such as leukemia. … [+4686 chars]

articles.author: Rylie Lillibridge
articles.title: 'The cosmic symphony of gravitational waves': UT researchers find gravitational waves shape universe - The Daily Texan
articles.description: As part of a team of scientists, UT researchers found evidence for gravitational waves that shape the universe. The results were the culmination of 15 years of research. “We basically are in a bath of gravitational waves all around us,” researcher and physics…
